activities:
HRToolbox was founded in 1998 to address the never-ending demands of global organizations.  By using the Internet as an enabling technology, we have developed an entirely web-based tool that allows international human resource professionals to more efficiently manage a growing expatriate and global employee population.  
If our clients ever have any questions or unresolved problems, they should contact HRToolbox, Inc. directly using the Contact Information found at 
http://www.hrtoolbox.com
.
HR Professionals employed by our clients maintain employee data in a secure database on our site.  Employee data includes personal and compensation information for employees in over 75 countries.
address: 4780 Ashford Dunwoody Road, Suite A, PMB 401
